name: Trekking to Sandakphu - Exploring the Best of Eastern Himalayas
description:
Trek through the beautiful yet challenging terrain of the region, socialize with local population, understand the geographical and socio-economic conditions of the region.

This journey is a unique and refreshing one along the border of the Indian subcontinent. As you trek into the snowy landscape of Sandakphu, you will discover an entire new world. The beauty and tranquility of the region and the magnanimity of the majestic mountains here make this journey an unforgettable experience. From Indo-Tibet border, you march towards Sandakphu peak. Although the journey may not be a piece of cake, the experience gained and the sights that await you at the peak of the mountain are rewarding enough.
